entries.journal_entry_description: Tripp Rar will test your hunting abilities by asking you to hunt moufs in Etyyy.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go speak with Tripp Rar at the primary Rodian hunting camp.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Tripp wants you to collect 14 pristine mouf pelts. Hunt vibrant moufs for those.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You collected enough pristine mouf pelts. Now return to Tripp at the main Rodian hunting camp.
